tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  pH DECIMAL,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  dissolved_oxygen DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_monitoring_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  pH FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  dissolved_oxygen FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  ph_level FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  dissolved_oxygen FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  ph_level FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  dissolved_oxygen FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_monitoring_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
  ph_level DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
  temperature DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
  dissolved_oxygen DECIMAL NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE location_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  latitude DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
  longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
  elevation DECIMAL NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  calibration_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  calibration_expiry_date DATE NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_station ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  station_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  location_id INT NOT NULL, 
  sensor_id INT NOT NULL 
)
